mapper.select: select CI_CODE, cit.CIT_CODE, CI_TITLE, CI_CONTENT, CI_DATE, CI_ANSWER, CI_ANSWERDATE, c.COU_CODE, i.INS_ID ,cit.CIT_NAME, c.cou_name, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY CI_DATE desc) ciInd from COURSES_INQUIRY ci, COURSES_INQUIRY_TYPE cit, INSTRUCTOR i, COURSES c where cit.cit_code = ci.cit_code and i.ins_id = ci.ins_id and ci.ui_id = #{uiId} and ci.cou_code = c.cou_code order by ciInd desc

select CI_TITLE, CI_CONTENT, CI_DATE, CI_ANSWER, CI_ANSWERDATE, CIT_NAME, INS_Name, c.cou_Name from COURSES_INQUIRY ci, COURSES_INQUIRY_TYPE cit,INSTRUCTOR i, COURSES c where ci.cit_code = cit.cit_code and ci.ins_id = i.ins_id and ci_code = #{ciCode} and c.cou_code = ci.cou_code
mapper.insert: insert into COURSES_INQUIRY(CI_CODE, UI_ID, CIT_CODE, CI_TITLE, CI_CONTENT, INS_ID, COU_CODE) values('CI_'||LPAD(CI_SEQ.nextVal, 6, '0'), #{uiId}, #{citCode}, #{ciTitle}, #{ciContent}, #{insId}, #{couCode})
